name: "Cyclone Summoner"
oracle_text: When "Cyclone Summoner" enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, return all permanents to their owners' hands except for Giants, Wizards, and lands.

name: Battle of Frost and Fire
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Battle of Frost and Fire deals 4 damage to each non-Giant creature and each planeswalker.
II — Scry 3.
III — Whenever you cast a spell with converted mana cost 5 or greater this turn, draw two cards, then discard a card.

name: Draugr's Helm
Wings of the Cosmos
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor_text: The wolf's startled yelp changed quickly to a howl of elation as she soared over her envious packmates.

name: Funeral Longboat
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"Cast onto the windless water, he drifted until the sea turned to sky."
—*Saga of the Lost King*

name: Goldvein Pick
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: "Mystic Reflection"
oracle_text:
Choose target nonlegendary creature. The next time one or more creatures or planeswalkers would enter the battlefield, they enter the battlefield as copies of the chosen creature instead.
Foretell {U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: "Beasts of Littjara"
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 2/2 blue Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.
II — Any number of target Shapeshifters you control have base power and toughness 4/4.
III — Choose up to one target creature or planeswalker. Each creature you control with power 4 or greater deals damage equal to its power to that permanent.

name: Battle for Bretagard
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 1/1 white Human Warrior creature token.
II — Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
III — Choose any number of artifact tokens and/or creature tokens you control with different names. For each of them, create a token thats a copy of it.

name: Narfi, Betrayer King
oracle_text:
Other snow and Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
{S}{S}{S}: Return Narfi, Betrayer King from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: To serve the god of death, Narfi forfeited the warmth of life.

name: Clarion Spirit
oracle_text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: To the living, the horn sounds faint and mournful, but to the spirits of Istfell, it is a thunderous call that must be obeyed.

name: Aegar, the Freezing Flame
oracle_text: Whenever a creature or planeswalker an opponent controls is dealt excess damage, if a Giant, Wizard, or spell you controlled dealt damage to it this turn, draw a card.

name: Firja's Judgment
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 4/4 white Angel Warrior creature token with flying and vigilance.
II — Until end of turn, Angels you control gain "{T}: Destroy target creature with less power than this creature."
III — Angels you control gain double strike until end of turn.

name: Gnottvold Recluse
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: Fed up with webs impeding travelers in other realms, Kolvori banished the giant spiders to Gnottvold, where their webs snare only the occasional rampaging troll.

name: Frostpeak Yeti
oracle_text: {1}{S}: Frostpeak Yeti can't be blocked this turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: Some heroes line their coats with yeti fur. More yetis line with bellies with heroes.

name: Codespell Cleric
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Codespell Cleric enters the battlefield, if it was the second spell you cast this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Today we are not Beskir or Tuskeri. We must fight as one class, shoulder to shoulder, to defend our rightful home."

name: Mammoth Growth
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
Foretell {G} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: Thus the longhall became a flathall.

name: "Demonic Lightning"
oracle_text: "Demonic Lightning" deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

name: Burning-Rune Demon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Burning-Rune Demon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for exactly two cards not named Burning-Rune Demon that have different names. If you do, reveal those cards. An opponent choses of them. Put the chosen card into your hand and the other into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.

name: Run Amok
oracle_text: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"A Tuskeri never shrinks from battle! Quite the opposite in fact."
—Arni Brokenbrow

name: Crush the Weak
oracle_text:
Crush the Weak deals 2 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

oracle_text:

Foretell {X}{X}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: Dual Strike
oracle_text:
When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell with converted mana cost 4 or less this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card_faces.oracle_text: {T}: You may play target snow permanent card from your graveyard this turn. If you do, it enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Egon, God of Death // Throne of Death

card_faces.name: Egon, God of Death
card_faces.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile two cards from your graveyard. If you can't, sacrifice Egon and draw a card.

card_faces.name: Throne of Death
card_faces.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card.
{2}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Draw a card.

type_line: Legendary Creature — God // Legendary Artifact — Equipment

Trample

name: Harald, King of Skemfar
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Harald, King of Skemfar enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an Elf, Warrior, or Tyvar card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Basalt Ravager
oracle_text: When Basalt Ravager enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the greatest number of creatures you control that have a creature type in common.

name: Frostpyre Arcanist
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} lessto cast if you control a Giant or a Wizard.
When Frostpyre Arcanist enters the battlefield, search your library for an instant or sorcery card with the same name as a card in your graveyard, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Weathered Runestone
oracle_text:
Nonland permanent cards in graveyards and libraries can't enter the battlefield.
Players can't cast spells from graveyards or libraries.

oracle_text:
Flying
{S}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

name: "My Larger Pony"
oracle_text: {1}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target opponent loses 3 life.

name: Squash
oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if you control a Giant.
Squash deals 6 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: The troll had recently crushed a human in much the same way. Sadly, he expired too quickly to appreciate the irony.

name: "Shepherd of the Cosmos"
oracle_text:
Flying
When "Shepherd of the Cosmos" enters the battlefield, return target permanent each with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: "Pyrefly Chomper"
oracle_text: Whenever you cast your second spell of the turn, put a +1/+1 counter on "Pyrefly Chomper". It gains flying until end of turn.

name: "Matantiga Mentor"
oracle_text: When "Matantiga Mentor" enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

name: "Jasper Sentinel"
oracle_text:
Reach
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

name: Search for Glory
oracle_text: Search your library for a snow permanent card, a legendary card, or a Saga card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. You gain 1 life for each {S} spent to cast this spell.

name: Rune of Flight
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Rune of Flight enters the battlefield, draw a card.
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it has flying.
As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature has flying."

name: Cinderheart Giant
oracle_text:
Trample
When Cinderheart Giant dies, it deals 7 damage to a creature an opponent controls chosen at random.
flavor_text: What fire giants lack in arcane prowess they make up for with reckless, explosive rage.

name: Feed the Serpent
oracle_text: Exile target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: He spent the final moments of his existence tumbling down the length of the serpent's jaws, driven mad by the magnitude of the Cosmos.

name: "Midas Touch't"
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent can't attack, block, or crew Vehicles, and its abilities can't be activated unless they are mana abilities.

name: Elderfang Disciple
oracle_text: When Elderfang Disciple enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: "One day, the great serpent will rejoin us on Skemfar, and those who've wronged us will taste our venom."

name: "Big-Booty Ox"
oracle_text: You may use "Big-Booty Ox"'s toughness to crew rather than its power.
